about_the_game:
Say goodbye to blurry and pixelated images! SuperImage uses cutting-edge AI technology to upscale and restore the details of your favourite pictures

✨ Key Features

🚀 Unlimited Image Enhancements

Enhance and upscale images without worrying about credits and subscriptions. Sky is the limit!

💻 On Device Processing

Take advantage of modern computer hardware combined with our advanced AI stack to process your images locally, without sharing them with an online service. No internet connection required

👥 Enhance Your Portraits

Sharpen details, refine facial features, and enhance background clarity of your low-resolution portraits. Your friends never looked this good before

🖼 Images Sharper Than Ever

Upscale your photos, wallpapers and anime waifus up to 16x their original resolution. Blurry pictures are a thing of the past

🛠️ Load Custom Models

For advanced users who want a experience more tailored to their needs, you can import your favourite models in PyTorch, ONNX and MNN formats with just one click

🔒 Your Privacy, Our Priority

SuperImage processes your photos locally on your device, never uploading them to the cloud

name: SuperImage Pro

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 bit
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Say goodbye to blurry and pixelated images! SuperImage uses cutting-edge AI technology to upscale and restore the details of your favourite pictures
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Catalan, Filipino, Hebrew, Hindi, Serbian
